name: Zero Escape: Through Zero Eyes
description:
"Remember, that even the smallest of choices can have the most drastic outcomes"                --Zero

When twelve people are abducted and forced to play an outrageously deadly game, what will happen to you, the player, as you journey through the scenarios of each team and present yourself to the other teams?

Currently this is made in Twine, using only the basic functions. This game is still VASTLY in development, and the price reflects it's polish and progress.
